scripts.__prepare-folder: rm -rf out && cp -R static out/ && cp LICENSE out/ && cp manifest.json out/ && node ./env/set-client-id.js out/manifest.json
scripts.__develop-core: npm run __check-types && esbuild --define:process.env.LOG_LEVEL=\"ALL\" src/*.ts src/themes/custom/custom.ts src/integration/index.ts --bundle --sourcemap=inline --outdir=out
scripts.build: npm run __prepare-folder && npm run __check-types && esbuild --define:process.env.LOG_LEVEL=\"ALL\" src/*.ts src/themes/custom/custom.ts src/integration/index.ts --bundle --minify --outdir=out
